gw.plugin.invoice

Interface IPaymentPlan

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin, java.rmi.Remote

    public interface IPaymentPlan
extends com.guidewire.pl.system.integration.plugins.internal.InternalPlugin
    This plugin provides hooks for the creation of invoice items through a payment plan

    • Method Detail

      • createFullSetOfInstallmentEventDates

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<java.util.Date> createFullSetOfInstallmentEventDates(Charge charge,
                                                                             java.util.List<java.util.Date> defaultCreatedInstallmentEventDates)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) This method is no longer invoked by BillingCenter. Use createFullSetOfInstallmentEventDates(gw.api.domain.charge.ChargeInitializer, java.util.List)
        This method returns a list of dates that will be used as the EventDates of a full set of installment invoice items created for a charge.

        Note that this method is called only in situations where the system wants to create the full set of invoice items for a charge, such as:

        • When a charge is coming in fresh as part of executing a BillingInstruction
        • When a policy period's payment plan is changed with the option "refactor ALL invoice items"
        The method is passed the suggested list of default EventDates for the set of invoice items that the invoice item generation algorithm will create for a charge.

        If that set of EventDates is acceptable, this method should just return the list unaltered.

        Otherwise, if there is a desire to customize the list of EventDates by modifying the EventDates or by removing or adding some EventDates to the list (thereby increasing or decreasing the number of installments that will be generated), this method should do that and then return an updated list of EventDates.

        Parameters:
        charge - the charge that the list of invoice item event dates came from
        defaultCreatedInstallmentEventDates - the system-created list of installment EventDates for the installments invoice items of the charge
        Returns:
        list of EventDates that the system should use for the installment invoice items of the charge

      • createFullSetOfInvoiceItems

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<InvoiceItem> createFullSetOfInvoiceItems(Charge charge,
                                                                 java.util.List<InvoiceItem> defaultCreatedInvoiceItems)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.0) This method is no longer invoked by BillingCenter. IChargeInitializer.customizeChargeInitializer(gw.api.domain.charge.ChargeInitializer) is used similarly during Charge initialization.
        This method returns a list of invoice items that will be used as the full set of children invoice items that are created for charge.

        Note that this method is called only in situations where the system wants to create the full set of invoice items for a charge, such as:

        • When a charge is coming in fresh as part of executing a BillingInstruction
        • When a policy period's payment plan is changed with the option "refactor ALL invoice items"
        The method is passed the suggested list of default invoice items that the default invoice item generation algorithm creates for a charge.

        If that set of invoice items is acceptable, this method should just return that list unaltered.

        But if there is a desire to customize the list of invoice items by modifying the amounts of the invoice items, or by removing or adding some invoice items to the list, this method should do that and then return an updated list of invoice items.

        Parameters:
        charge - the charge that the list of invoice items came from
        defaultCreatedInvoiceItems - default list of invoice items created for a charge
        Returns:
        list of invoice items that the system should use as the invoice items of a charge

      • recreatePlannedInstallmentEventDatesForPaymentPlanChange

        java.util.List<java.util.Date> recreatePlannedInstallmentEventDatesForPaymentPlanChange(Charge charge,
                                                                                      java.util.List<java.util.Date> defaultRecreatedPlannedInstallmentEventDates)
        This method returns a list of EventDates that should be used for the installment invoice items added to a charge to replace any original invoice items of the charge that were removed as part of a payment plan change to a policy period when the "refactor PLANNED invoice items" option was used.

        The method is passed the suggested list of default event dates for installment invoice items that the invoice item generation algorithm creates for a charge when a "refactor PLANNED invoice items" policy period payment plan change has occurred.

        If that set of EventDates is acceptable, this method should just return that list unaltered.

        Otherwise, if there is a desire to customize the list of EventDates by modifying the EventDates or by removing or adding some EventDates to the list (thereby increasing or decreasing the number of installments that will be generated), this method should make those changes and return an updated list of EventDates.

        Parameters:
        charge - the charge that the list of invoice item event dates came from
        defaultRecreatedPlannedInstallmentEventDates - default list of installment EventDates created for the installments of a charge by the system when a payment plan change has occurred with the option "refactor PLANNED invoice items"
        Returns:
        list of installment EventDates that the system should use for the installment invoice items created for a charge to replace those planned invoice items which were removed from the charge as part of a payment plan change with the "refactor PLANNED invoice items" option

      • createFullSetOfInstallmentEventDates

        java.util.List<java.util.Date> createFullSetOfInstallmentEventDates(ChargeInitializer initializer,
                                                                  java.util.List<java.util.Date> defaultCreatedInstallmentEventDates)
        This method returns a list of dates that will be used as the EventDates of a full set of installment invoice items created for a charge.

        Note that this method is called only when a charge is coming in fresh as part of executing a BillingInstruction The method is passed the suggested list of default EventDates for the set of invoice items that the invoice item generation algorithm will create for a charge.

        If that set of EventDates is acceptable, this method should just return the list unaltered.

        Otherwise, if there is a desire to customize the list of EventDates by modifying the EventDates or by removing or adding some EventDates to the list (thereby increasing or decreasing the number of installments that will be generated), this method should do that and then return an updated list of EventDates.

        Parameters:
        initializer - the planned charge that the list of invoice item event dates came from
        defaultCreatedInstallmentEventDates - the system-created list of installment EventDates for the installments invoice items of the charge
        Returns:
        list of EventDates that the system should use for the installment invoice items of the charge

      • recreatePlannedInvoiceItemsForPaymentPlanChange

        @Deprecated
java.util.List<InvoiceItem> recreatePlannedInvoiceItemsForPaymentPlanChange(Charge charge,
                                                                                     java.util.List<InvoiceItem> defaultRecreatedPlannedInvoiceItems)
        Deprecated. (Since 8.0.4) This plugin method is no longer called.
        This method returns a list of invoice items that should be added to a charge to replace any original invoice items of the charge that were removed as part of a payment plan change to a policy period when the "refactor PLANNED invoice items" option was used.

        The method is passed the suggested list of default invoice items that our out of the box invoice item generation algorithm creates for a charge when a "refactor PLANNED invoice items" policy period payment plan change has occurred.

        If that set of invoice items is acceptable, this method should just return that list unaltered.

        Otherwise, if there is a desire to customize the list of invoice items by modifying the amounts of the invoice items, or removing or adding some invoice items to the list, this method should make those changes and then return an updated list of invoice items.

        Parameters:
        charge - the charge that the list of invoice items came from
        defaultRecreatedPlannedInvoiceItems - suggested list of invoice items created for a charge by the system out of the box for the case when a payment plan change has occurred with the option "refactor PLANNED invoice items"
        Returns:
        list of invoice items that the system should use as the invoice items of a charge created to replace those planned invoice items which were removed from the charge as part of a payment plan change with the "refactor PLANNED invoice items" option

      • recreateInvoiceItemsForPaymentPlanChange

        void recreateInvoiceItemsForPaymentPlanChange(ChargeInstallmentChanger changer)
        Allows modification of the default plan for recreation of a charge's planned invoice items after Payment Plan Change.
        Parameters:
        changer - ChargeInstallmentChanger interface, pre-populated with the suggested list of invoice items created for a charge by the system out of the box for the case when a payment plan change has occurred with the option "refactor PLANNED invoice items"
